title: Evaluation metric example: Categorization
author: David Roberts
readme:
## AI evaluation in n8n

This is a template for n8n's [evaluation feature](https://docs.n8n.io/advanced-ai/evaluations/overview).

Evaluation is a technique for getting confidence that your AI workflow performs reliably, by running a test dataset containing different inputs through the workflow.

By calculating a metric (score) for each input, you can see where the workflow is performing well and where it isn't.

## How it works

This template shows how to calculate a workflow evaluation metric: **whether a category matches the expected one**.

The workflow takes support tickets and generates a category and priority, which is then compared with the correct answers in the dataset.

  * We use an evaluation trigger to read in our dataset
  * It is wired up in parallel with the regular trigger so that the workflow can be started from either one. [More info](https://docs.n8n.io/advanced-ai/evaluations/tips-and-common-issues/#combining-multiple-triggers)
  * Once the category is generated by the agent, we check whether it matches the expected one in the dataset
  * Finally we pass this information back to n8n as a metric
readme_zh:
## n8n中的AI评估功能

这是一个针对n8n[评估特性](https://docs.n8n.io/advanced-ai/evaluations/overview)的模板方案。

评估技术通过让工作流处理包含不同输入的测试数据集，帮助您确认AI工作流的运行可靠性。通过为每个输入计算指标（得分），您可以直观掌握工作流的表现情况。

## 实现原理

本模板演示如何计算工作流评估指标：**生成分类是否符合预期结果**。该工作流会处理客服工单并生成分类与优先级，随后与数据集中的标准答案进行比对。

* 使用评估触发器读取数据集
* 评估触发器与常规触发器采用并联设计，支持从任意入口启动工作流（[详见说明](https://docs.n8n.io/advanced-ai/evaluations/tips-and-common-issues/#combining-multiple-triggers)）
* 当智能体生成分类后，系统会校验该结果是否与数据集预期值匹配
* 最终将这些比对信息作为评估指标回传给n8n系统
